description: The effects of poor nutrition and how good nutrition leads to a healthy lifestyle.

cleaned_text: Health: Your official portal to public health services, hospitals, health information and health careers in South Australia The risks of poor nutrition Nourishing your body by eating well every day has many benefits, including: - providing the essential energy and nutrients we need to get through the day - keeping our immune system strong - reducing our risk of developing serious health conditions such as heart disease, stroke, diabetes, some cancers or osteoporosis - improving concentration - keeping our teeth and gums healthy - reducing stress and helping to maintain mental health and wellbeing Further information about how to look after your health and wellbeing can be found on the
